aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-2747-401 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 04/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 05/04/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 08/04/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 07/04/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 13/04/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
